paragraphs: I am a Full-Stack Developer with a Mechanical Engineering background and a passion for crafting innovative technological solutions. My expertise includes web development, data visualization, and system integrations. Proficient in modern frameworks and technologies such as Node.js, React, Python, Postgres and MongoDB, I delivered data-driven insights using BI tools like Power BI and Looker.

Throughout my career, I've led innovative projects, from designing Management Information Systems (MIS) for large-scale e-commerce operations to developing monitoring platforms and robust data workflows. My professional journey includes key roles at Supercampo, enhancing the digital presence of agricultural cooperatives, and SIMEPAR, contributing to critical dam monitoring system.

volunteering.description: In Brazil since 2006, TETO is an organization formed by young volunteers who implement housing and habitat initiatives in precarious favelas alongside residents, strengthening capacities to develop self-managed communities and, thus, overcome poverty in our country. In 2023, TETO achieved the milestone of constructing 500 houses in the state of Paraná.

artworks.title: Commemorative Mural of the Centenary of UTFPR (1909-2009)
artworks.description: The Federal Technological University of Paraná (UTFPR) celebrated its 100th anniversary on September 23, 2009. The institution was created as the School of Apprentice Craftsmen in 1909 by President Nilo Peçanha, and offered courses in trades such as tailoring, shoemaking, carpentry and metalworking. In 1978, it became the Federal Center for Technological Education of Paraná (Cefet-PR) and began offering full undergraduate courses.

artworks.title: A bust of a warrior
artworks.description: Sketch of 'A bust of a warrior' Aprox. 50 x 70cm, pencil on painted wall. Drawing based on Da Vinci's masterpiece 'A bust of a warrior in profile to left, wearing a winged helmet and armour bearing a lion on the breastplate'. Silverpoint, on cream prepared paper. Production date: 1475-1480, 287mm x 211mm.
